attributes.action: To stop Bailiff's having more powers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Bailiff's being given more powers. Stop Bailiff's making unessesary extra charges that far out weigh original debts that create more debts to those who can't afford the original debt. Stop Bailiff's abusing thier positions & enforce more guidelines on thier practices & charges & put a maximum limit on what they can add in charges. Put a stop to Bailiff's making excessive money out of those already in debt & stop them taking items they know far exceed the price of the debt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
